1073:2: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ |
1073:4: iha hi bhagavatā uṣitabrahmacaryāṇāṃ tathāgataśāsanapratipannānnāṃ dharmānudharmapratipattiyuktānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dvividhaṃ nirvāṇamupavarṇitaṃ sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ ca |
1073:5: tatra niravaśeṣasya avidyārāgādikasya kleśagaṇasya prahāṇāt sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇamiṣyate |
1073:27: etacca dvividhaṃ nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ yujyate yadi kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca nirodho bhavati?
1073:37: svabhāvena hi vyavasthitānāṃ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt kuto nivṛttiḥ,
1073:40: na ca śūnyatā vādinaḥ skandhanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ kleśanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ vā nirvāṇamicchanti yatasteṣāmayaṃ doṣaḥ syāditi |
1073:42: yadi khalu śūnyatāvādinaḥ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā nivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ necchanti,
1073:51: tat kutastasminnitthaṃvidhe niṣprapañce kleśakalpanā yeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇānnirvāṇaṃ bhavet?
1073:57: atha syāt - yadyapi nirvāṇe na santi kleśāḥ,
1073:63: yasmānnirvāṇādarvāk svabhāvato vidyamānānāṃ na punarabhāvaḥ śakyate kartum |
1073:66: nivāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca |
1073:68: tadevaṃ nirvāṇe na kasyacit prahāṇaṃ nāpi kasyacinnirodha iti vijñeyam |
1073:72: ye neha astī na te jātu asti |
1073:75: asyā gāthāyā ayamarthaḥ - nivṛtau nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau dharmāṇāṃ kleśakarmajanmalakṣaṇānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā sarvathā astaṃgamādastitvaṃ nāsti,
1073:77: ye tarhi dharmā iha nirvṛtau na santi,
1073:80: na te dharmāḥ kleśakarmajanmādilakṣaṇāḥ kasmiṃścit kāle saṃsārāvasthāyāmapi tattvato vidyante |
1073:81: na hi rajjuḥ andhakārāvasthāyāṃ svarūpataḥ sarpo'sti,
1073:83: kathaṃ tarhi saṃsāraḥ iti cet, ucyate |
1073:84: ātmātmīyāsadgrahagrastānāṃ bālapṛthagjanānāmasatsvarūpā api bhāvāḥ satyataḥ pratibhāsante taimirikāṇāmiva asatkeśamaśakādaya iveti | āha -
1073:86: mevaṃ carantāna na duḥkha śāmyati | iti |
1073:89: tadanyeṣāṃ ca atītānāgatasaṃsthānāṃ vijñaptiviprayuktasaṃskārāṇāṃ nāstivādināṃ tadanyadastivādinām,
1073:92: evamastināstivādināmevaṃ caratāṃ na duḥkhaṃ saṃsāraḥ śāmyatīti | tathā -
1073:94: no cāpi koṣṭha gantu āviṣṭa papadyate |
1073:97: tadevaṃ na kasyacinnirvāṇe prahāṇaṃ nāpi kasyacinnirodha iti vijñeyam |
1073:100: na cābhāvo'pi nirvāṇaṃ kuta evāsya bhāvanā |
1073:103: ye tu sarvakalpanopaśamarūpaṃ nirvāṇamapratipadyamānāḥ bhāvābhāvatadubhayānubhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ parikalpayanti,
1073:106: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā ||4||
1073:107: tatraike bhāvato nirvāṇamabhiniviṣṭā evamācakṣate - iha kleśakarmajanmasaṃtānapravṛttiniyata rodhabhūto jalapravāharodhabhūtasetusthānīyo nirodhātmakaḥ padārthaḥ,
1073:109: na ca avidyamāna svabhāvo dharmaḥ evaṃ kāryakārī dṛśyate |
1073:110: nanu ca yo'syā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇamityuktam,
1073:111: na ca kṣayamātraṃ bhāvo bhavitumarhati | tathā -
1073:113: ityuktam | na ca pradyotasya nivṛttirbhāva ityupapadyate |
1073:115: naitadevaṃ vijñeyaṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayaḥ tṛṣṇākṣayaḥ iti |
1073:116: kiṃ tarhi tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo'sminniti nirvāṇākhye dharme sati bhavati,
1073:119: tatrāpi yasmin sati cetaso vimokṣo bhavatīti veditavyamiti ||
1073:120: evaṃ bhāve nirvāṇa vyavasthāpite ācāryo nirūpayati - bhāvastāvanna nirvāṇam |
1073:127: tāmeva ca jarāmaraṇalakṣaṇavyabhicāritāṃ spaṣṭayannāha - asti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vineti |
1073:133: bhāvaśca yadi nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet |
1073:134: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kkacana kaścana ||5||
1073:141: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kkacana kaścana |
1073:147: nirvāṇaṃ nānupādāya kaścid bhāvo hi vidyate ||6||
1073:158: vyatireka kāraṇamāha - nānupādāya kaścidbhāvo hi vidyate iti ||6||
1073:159: atrāha - yadi bhāvo hi na nirvāṇam ,
1073:164: yadi bhāvo na nirvāṇamabhāvaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati |
1073:165: nirvāṇaṃ yatra bhāvo na nābhāvastatra vidyate ||7||
1073:179: tatra abhāvaḥ anityatā vā bhāvamupādāya prajñapyate,
1073:183: ataḥ parasparāpekṣikyāṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇa pravṛttau kuto lakṣyaṃ bhāvamapekṣya anityatā bhaviṣyati?
1073:189: etadeva spaṣṭayannāha - na hyabhāvo'sti yo'nupādāya vidyate iti ||
1073:198: ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca |
1073:208: tataśca sthitameva na hyabhāvo'sti yo'nupādāya vidyate iti ||8||
1073:209: atrāha - yadi bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ na bhavati,
1073:216: sa cāyamājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ kadāciddhetupratyayasāmagrīmāśritya astīti prajñapyate dīrghahrasvavat |
1073:219: yadi vā pratītya jāyata iti vyavasthāpyate,
1073:220: sarvathāsya janmamaraṇaparaṃparāprabandhasya apratītya vā anupādāya vā apravṛttistannirvāṇa miti vyavasthāpyate |
1073:221: na ca apravṛttimātraṃ bhāvo'bhāvo veti parikalpitu pāryata iti |
1073:224: teṣāṃ pratītya pratītya ya utpādaśca vināśaśca ,
1073:227: teṣāṃ tasya nityānityatvenā - vācyasya tattadupādānamāśritya ya ājavaṃjavībhāvaḥ sa upādāya pravartate,
1073:228: sa evopādāyopādāya pravartayamānaḥ sannidānīmanupādāyāpravartayamāno nirvāṇamiti vyapadiśyate |
1073:229: na ca saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā apravṛttimātrakaṃ bhāvo'bhāvo veti śakyaṃ parikalpayitum |
1073:230: ityato'pi na bhāvo nābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yujyate ||9||
1073:234: tatra sūtra uktam - ye kecidbhikṣavo bhavena bhavasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante vibhavena vā,
1073:237: ubhayaṃ hyetat parityājyaṃ bhave tṛṣṇā vibhave tṛṣṇā ca |
1073:244: yeṣāmapi kleśajanmanostatrābhāvādabhāvarūpaṃ nirvāṇaṃ svayaṃ ca bhāvarūpatvādbhāvarūpamityubhayarūpam,
1073:250: tadā bhāvaśca abhāvaśca mokṣa iti syāt |
1073:251: tataśca yaḥ saṃskārāṇāmātmalābhaḥ tasya ca vigamaḥ,
1073:253: na ca saṃskārā eva mokṣa iti yujyate |
1073:254: ata evāha - tacca na yujyate iti ||11||
1073:265: iti kṛtvā ubhayametad bhāvaṃ ca abhāvaṃ ca upādāyaiva bhavati,
1073:272: asaṃskṛtaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau ||13||
1073:281: athāpi syāt- naiva hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvasvarūpam,
1073:287: bhāvābhāvayorapi parasparaviruddhayorekatra nirvāṇe nāsti saṃbhava iti , ataḥ,
1073:290: idānīṃ yathā naiva bhāvo naivābhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yujyate,
1073:293: abhāve caiva bhāve ca sā siddhe sati sidhyati ||15||
1073:294: yadi hi bhāvo nāma kaścit syāt,
1073:295: tadā tatpratiṣedhena naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamityeṣā kalpanā,
1073:300: tasmānnaiva bhāvo naivābhāvo nirvāṇamiti yā kalpanā,
1073:304: naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yadi vidyate |
1073:305: naivābhāvo naiva bhāva iti kena tadajyate ||16||
1073:306: yadi etannirvāṇaṃ naivābhāvarūpaṃ naiva bhāvarūpamastīti kalpyate,
1073:307: kena tadānīṃ taditthaṃvidhaṃ nobhayarūpaṃ nirvāṇamastīti ajyate gṛhyate prakāśate vā?
1073:308: kiṃ tatra nirvāṇe kaścidevaṃvidhaḥ pratipattāsti, atha nāsti?
1073:309: yadi asti, evaṃ sati nirvāṇe'pi tavātmā syāt |
1073:326: kathaṃ tenāvidyamānasvarūpeṇa naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamiti gṛhyate,
1073:328: tasmānna kenacinnirvāṇaṃ naivābhāvo naiva bhāva ityajyate |
1073:330: sarvathā yathā ca nirvāṇe etāścatasraḥ kalpanā na saṃbhavanti,
1073:331: evaṃ nirvāṇādhigantaryapi tathāgate etāḥ kalpanā naiva saṃbhavantīti pratipādayannāha -
1073:333: na bhavatyubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate ||17||
1073:336: nāstīti vā kalpayan sa nirvṛtasya vikalpayet |
1073:337: evaṃ tāvat paraṃ nirodhādbhavati tathāgato na bhavati ceti nohyate |
1073:340: na ca kevalaṃ paraṃ nirodhāccaturbhiḥ prakārairbhagavānnohyate, api ca -
1073:343: yathā nājyaṃ na cohyaṃ tathā tathāgataparīkṣāyāṃ pratipāditam ||18||
1073:349: ata eva saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ parasparato nāsti kaścidviśeṣaḥ,
1073:351: yaccāpīdamuktaṃ bhagavatā - anavarāgro hi bhikṣavo jātijarāmaraṇasaṃsāra iti ,
1073:355: nirvāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca |
1073:357: na ca kevalaṃ saṃsārasya nirvāṇenāviśiṣṭatvāt pūrvāparakoṭikalpanā na saṃbhavati, yā apyetāḥ -
1073:362: tatra paraṃ nirodhādityanenopalakṣaṇena catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ parigṛhyante |
1073:365: bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt,
1073:366: naiva bhavati na na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi |
1073:374: tatra ātmano lokasya vā anāgatamutpādamapaśyan antavān loka ityevaṃ kalpayan aparāntamālambya pravartate|
1073:375: evamanāgatamutpādaṃ paśyan anantavān loka ioti pravartate|
1073:383: tatra ātmano lokasya vā atītamutpādaṃ paśyan śāśvato loka iti pratipadyate,
1073:386: naiva paśyannaivāpaśyan naivaśāśvato nāśāśvataśceti pratipadyate pūrvāntamāaśritya |
1073:394: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca kiṃ vā nobhayamapyataḥ ||23||
1073:395: caturdaśāpyetāni avyākṛtavastūni asati bhāvasvarūpe naiva yujyante|
1073:396: yastu bhāvasvarūpamadhyāropya tadvigamāvigamataḥ etā dṛṣṭīrutpādya abhiniviśate,
1073:399: atrāha - yadi evaṃ bhavatā nirvāṇamapi pratiṣiddham,
1073:400: nanu ca ya eṣa bhavagatā anantacaritasattvarāśyanuvartakena viditāviparītasakalajagadāśayasvabhāvena mahākarūṇāparatantreṇa priyaikaputra kapremānugatāśeṣatribhuvanajanena caritapratipakṣānurūpo dharmo deśito lokasya nirvāṇādhigamārtham,
1073:401: sa evaṃ sati vyartha eva jāyate|
1073:402: ucyate - yadi kaściddharmo nāma svabhāvarūpataḥ syāt,
1073:404: kaścidvā deśitā buddho bhagavānnāma bhāvasvabhāvaḥ syāt,
1073:409: iha hi sarveṣāṃ prapañcānāṃ nimittānāṃ ya upaśamo'pravṛttistannirvāṇam |
1073:415: yadā caivaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvaprapañcopaśāntarūpe nirvāṇe śive'sthānayogena nabhasīva haṃsarājāḥ sthitāḥ svapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārapakṣapātavāte vātagagane vā gaganasyākiṃcanatvāt,
1073:416: tadā sarvanimittānupalambhānna kkaciddeveṣu vā manuṣyeṣu vā na kasyaciddevasya vā manuṣyasya vā na kaściddharmaḥ sāṃkleśiko vā vaiyavadāniko vā deśita iti vijñeyam |
1073:417: yathoktamāryatathāgataguhyasūtre - “ yāṃ ca rātriṃ śāntamate tathāgato'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
1073:419: atrāntare tathāgate- naikamapyakṣaraṃ nodāhṛtaṃ na vyāhṛtaṃ nāpi pravyāharati nāpi pravyāhariṣyati |
1073:420: atha ca yathādhimuktāḥ sarvasattvā nānādhātvāśayāstāṃ tāṃ vividhāṃ tathāgatavācaṃ niścarantīṃ saṃjānanti |
1073:421: teṣāmevaṃ pṛthak pṛthagbhavati - ayaṃ bhagavānasmabhyamimaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
1073:423: tatra tathāgato na kalpayati na vikalpayati |
1073:428: ya evaṃ jānati dharmān kumāro buddha socyate ||
1073:429: yadi tarhyevaṃ na kkacitkasyacitkaściddharmo buddhena deśitaḥ,
1073:430: tatkathamime ete vicitrāḥ pravacanavyavahārāḥ prajñāyante? ucyate |
1073:431: avidyānidrānugatānāṃ dehināṃ svapnāyamānānāmiva svavikalpābhyudaya eṣaḥ - ayaṃ bhagavān sakalatribhuvanasurāsuranaranāthaḥ imaṃ dharmamasmabhyaṃ deśayatīti |
1073:438: tataśca nirvāṇārthaṃ dharmadeśanāyā abhāvāt kuto dharmadeśanāyāḥ sadbhāvena nirvāṇasyāstitvaṃ bhaviṣyati?
1073:443: tathā - na teṣāṃ bhagavan saṃsārasamatikramo ye nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante |
1073:445: nirvāṇamiti bhagavan yaḥ praśamaḥ sarvanimittānāmuparatiḥ sarveñjitasamiñjitānām |
1073:446: tadime bhagavan mohapuruṣā ye svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya tīrthikadṛṣṭau nipatitā nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante tadyathā tilebhyastailaṃ kṣīrātsarpiḥ |
1073:447: atyantaparinirvṛteṣu bhagavan sarvadharmeṣu ye nirvāṇaṃ mārganti tānahamābhimānikān tīrthikāniti vadāmi |
1073:448: na bhagavan yogācāraḥ samyak pratipannaḥ kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā karoti,
